Text: Free Bag of Produce with your next orderIMAGE IMAGE Dear Scott Thank you for shopping with GroceryWorkscom by Randalls We really appreciate your business and value you as a customer so when you shop during the month of June we would like to offer you a bag of our fresh produce when you order or more Just enter the word FRUIT in the coupon code box at check out When you shop at GroceryWorkscom by Randalls you get the best of what you would buy instore with the convenience of never having to leave home IMAGE Selection your favorite brands Value competitive pricing and lots of weekly specials Remarkable Card Benefits like airline miles Convenience you can shop when you want to shop And when youre ready simply pick a convenient delivery window that fits your schedule Our Fast Shop feature saves every item you purchase so the next time you shop it takes even less time than the last IMAGE And everything is guaranteed no questions asked So log onto GroceryWorkscom today and experience the benefits of shopping at GroceryWorkscom by Randalls Your friends at GroceryWorks PS For your convenience weve included your User Name below if you cant remember your Password please call customer service at User Name Start Shopping Now IMAGE Offer expires One coupon per household please Coupon may not be combined with any other promotional offer or exchanged for cash Offer good while supplies last and valid for online purchases only If for any reason you would prefer not to continue receiving information from us please click here and you will be removed from our mailing list

SorryWe GoofedDear Scott This morning you inadvertently received an email that was intended for our Austin customers only Unfortunately it is not valid in any other markets We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused Your friends at GroceryWorks IMAGE IMAGE

Schools Out Summer Snack IdeasIMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGEWell schools out for the summer and the kids are home and ready to snack Need some ideas for quick and easy snacks How about peanut butter jelly on white bread cut out into fun shapes with cookie cuttersor spread it on cold crunchy celery stalks Try chocolatedipped strawberries or frozen grapes for a cool and healthy treat Check out our weekly sales specials for some of these items and other great snack ideas Prices good June through June IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE Sunny Delight Assorted Flavors oz Sale Regularly Savings IMAGE Doritos Tortilla Chips Assorted Flavors Sale Regularly Savings IMAGE Large Gala Apples Sale Regularly Savings IMAGE Motts Apple Sauce Assorted Flavors pack Sale Regularly Savings IMAGE Skippy Peanut Butter Selected Varieties Sale Regularly Savings IMAGE Boars Head Sliced Honey Maple Turkey Breast Sale Regularly Savings IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE With the warm weather and longer days you dont want to spend all your time in the kitchen or the store So why not take advantage of summer fruits and vegetables and make some delicious salads the whole family can enjoy Consider adding sweet corn sliced off the cob mushrooms olives nuts or raisins to your favorite salad for a little bit of a change Canned tuna or grilled salmon also taste great on top of a salad IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE Sales specials are valid for the period indicated above and sale prices are valid for online purchases only Offer limited to Houston Austin residents in the GroceryWorks delivery area Offers good while supplies last You received this email because you are a registered customer of GroceryWorkscom If you prefer not to receive any information regarding website enhancements sales or promotions please click here and you will be removed from our email list GroceryWorks N Dallas Parkway Suite M Dallas TX IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE IMAGE
